sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>Whenever and enemy engaged with the character makes a combat check, after the attack is resolved, the character may spend 1 despair or 3 threat to stagger the attacker until the end of the attacker's next turn.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Overbalance</name> <number>TAL0001312</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-01-26 16:07:46</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c0111c212f910110e0f497eef699b67b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 16:07:46</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
